attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the key human rights issue of retaining innocent people's DNA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While some people take great exception to the DNA profiles of innocent people being held by police, others think it is a vital tool in fighting crime and would like to see it extended to the whole population. Because it is an issue of such fundamental human rights it is only right that the issue should be resolved by referendum
